text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @washingtonpost You keep saying the Failing @nytimes but it seems they are going strong! and will be here Long after you leave the WH which will be very soon! Nov. is not too far away. You are a total failure as a Leader during a time of crisis! COVID-19 exposed! how unfit you are to be POTUS
